Package remixlab.dandelion.agent

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionWheeledBiMotionAgent<P extends MotionProfile<?>>
    An ActionWheeledMotionAgent that handles Dandelion motion actions (i.e., actions triggered from a MotionEvent).
    HIDAgent
    An ActionWheeledBiMotionAgent representing a Human Interface Device with 6 Degrees-Of-Freedom (three translations and three rotations), such as the Space Navigator or any MultiTouch device.
    JoystickAgent
    An ActionWheeledBiMotionAgent representing a Human Interface Device with 3 Degrees-Of-Freedom (e.g., three translations or three rotations), such as some Joysticks.
    KeyboardAgent
    An ActionKeyboardAgent that handles Dandelion keyboard actions.
    MouseAgent
    An ActionWheeledBiMotionAgent representing a Wheeled mouse and thus only holds 2 Degrees-Of-Freedom (e.g., two translations or two rotations), such as most mice.
